name: OuedKniss Clear Dark
description: Applies light dark theme for OuedKniss and clear up ads
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("https://www.ouedkniss.com/"), domain("www.ouedkniss.com") {
.annonce {
	margin-top: 0.2em;
	margin-bottom: 0%;
}

#categories h2,
.html {
	background-color: #1d1d1d !important;
}

#topbar a {
	color: #bbb6b6;
}

#Description .description_label,
#Echange,
#Similaires p {
	color: #90b4e8;
}

#gallery .gallery_image img {
	border: none;
	background-color: transparent;
}

#menu_sousmenu_annonces_categories {
	background-color: #444;
}

.dialog_box {
	background-color: rgba(51, 51, 51, 0.90);
}

#adcontainer_1 {
	display: none;
}

#contact_page,
#left,
#menu,
#menu_recherche_query,
#Similaires .objet,
.comment_post_text,
.produit {
	background-color: #999;
}

#Annonceur,
#Annonceur p,
#divPages,
#espace_keywords input,
#footer,
#gallery,
#list-last-stores,
#may_like,
#page,
#page_top,
#page_middle,
#page_bottom,
#page_annonces_top,
#page_contenu,
#tbrss_contenu,
.annonce,
.annonce_store .annonce_right,
.annonce_right,
.button,
.dialog_box_contenu,
.plus_visitees_titre,
.sous_menu_categories,
.sous_menu,
.sous_menu a,
.tbascm,
.tp_titre,
h1 {
	background-color: #333;
}

.tbascm a.tbascm_sc,
.tp_titre,
.plus_visitees_titre,
#may_like,
#categories h1,
#categories a,
#categories .categorie_tout,
#footer,
.footer_block,
.footer_block>a,
#footer_copyrights>div.boxed,
#tbrss_contenu,
.tbrs label,
.window_annonce .window_annonce_titre,
.dialog_box_message,
.window_conversation_nom,
.window_conversation_message,
.window_no_result,
.label_large,
#data>p,
.map>small,
#page_annonces_top,
#navigation a p,
#espace_keywords input,
.annonce_get_description,
.annonce_titre h2,
.annonce_client_name .name,
.annonce_store .annonce_right,
.annonce_right,
.annonce_wilaya,
.sous_menu_categories a,
.comment_name,
#left #categories a,
#sous_menu_a_mes_annonces,
#sous_menu_a_ajouter_annonce,
#sous_menu_a_mes_messages,
#sous_menu_a_abonnements,
#sous_menu_a_profile,
#sous_menu_a_password,
#sous_menu_a_telephones,
#sous_menu_a_addresses {
	color: #999;
}

#recherche_suggestions a b,
.recherche_categorie_suggestion a,
.sous_menu_a,
.ErrorResult,
#Description a,
.description_span,
#Description p,
#GetDescription,
#gallery .gallery_span,
#Annonceur p,
#Annonceur a,
.button a,
.menu_a,
.annonce_titre a,
#Buttons span,
.conversation_message,
.label,
.checkbox_label,
.info,
.numero,
.comment_text,
#left #categories h2,
.notification label,
#Similaires .objet,
#menu,
#left,
.produit,
#contact_page,
.button,
.sous_menu a,
.annonce_left .annonce_get_description {
	color: aliceblue;
}

}
